name: Egg Hunt (itch) (W3)
description:
# Untitled Game Jam 62

This game was made for the Untitled Game Jam #62.

Play as one of the three multiverse variants of a Knight. The Knight must wander around a dungeon collecting coins, slaying enemies and most importantly searching for the 10 lost Easter Eggs that he was sent there to find.

If at any point you find yourself stuck, press 'K' which will kill your character.

NOTE:  Put your browser in full screen if you are using the WebGL version of the game, if you are still having issues with seeing the screen try the downloadable version. 

KNOWN BUGS: The Egg counter on the win screen is broken and displays twice as many eggs ( subtract one ) as you have

Have fun and enjoy! Please leave feedback if possible : ))
